text: (dutare,) nivu avara (visvasigala) palige saumyaragiruvudu allahana krpeye agide. Ondu vele nivu oratu svabhavadavaru kathora hrdayadavaru agiddare, avarella nim'ma baliyinda caduri hoguttiddaru. Nivu avarannu ksamisiri. Avara ksamegagi (allahanalli) prarthisiri mattu vividha visayagalalli avara jote samalocisiri. Innu nivu ondu nirdhara kaigondare (a kuritu) allahanalli sampurna bharavase ittu bidiri. (Tannalli) bharavase iduvavarannu allahanu khandita pritisuttane
